original_text: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden; and in the garden a new sepulchre, wherein was never man yet laid.
korean_text: 예수께서 십자가에 못 박히신 곳에 동산이 있고 동산 안에 아직 사람을 장사한 일이 없는 새 무덤이 있는지라

sentences.original_text: Now in the place where he was crucified
sentences.korean_translation: 자기가 십자가에 못 박혔던 그 장소에는

sentences.original_text: and in the garden a new sepulchre
wherein was never man yet laid
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에는 아직 사람이 없이 장사된 곳이더라
